product.title: Mr. Brown Can MOO! Can You? | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Mr. Brown Can MOO! Can You? by Dr. Seuss is simply a must for your child’s book collection. In this Dr. Seuss classic, the mustached Mr. Brown moos like a cow, squeaks like a shoe, and even “DIBBLE, DIBBLE, DIBBLE DOPPs” like the rain, encouraging young readers to practice pronunciation along the way. Adding to the fun, Mr. Brown Can MOO! Can You? features words illustrated to look as they sound in Dr. Seuss’s signature style. So, for an eyeful as well as an earful, pick up Dr. Seuss’s unforgettable Mr. Brown Can MOO! Can You?

Tie-in Activity: Take your time as you read this book with your child—and have fun with it! Babies will love hearing the silly noises, while older children will enjoy trying to make the sounds themselves. Then take a moment during the day to be quiet and listen for other sounds you can both imitate.
